20110112160205.000|20110112160208.000|TR0|being deployed across the Northeast right 
20110112160208.000|20110112160211.000|TR0|now to combat two powerful winter storms 
20110112160211.000|20110112160213.000|TR0|that have collided, sort of like a weather 
20110112160213.000|20110112160216.000|TR0|bomb.  A weather system that turned the 
20110112160216.000|20110112160218.000|TR0|South into an ice rink has merged with a 
20110112160218.000|20110112160221.000|TR0|storm from the plains. That's why it's a 
20110112160221.000|20110112160223.000|TR0|bomb.  It dumped heavy snow on major 
20110112160223.000|20110112160226.000|TR0|cities from Philadelphia to Boston.
20110112160226.000|20110112160228.000|TR0|

20110112160231.000|20110112160233.000|TR0|holding a news conference. He is vowing a 
20110112160233.000|20110112160236.000|TR0|rapid response to the storm after being 
20110112160236.000|20110112160238.000|TR0|sharply criticized for the city's slow 
20110112160238.000|20110112160241.000|TR0|response to a blizzard just weeks ago.

20110112161042.000|20110112161044.000|TR0|But this is a president who tends to be 
20110112161044.000|20110112161047.000|TR0|very hands-on with his speeches, 
20110112161047.000|20110112161049.000|TR0|especially the big ones, whether it's the 
20110112161049.000|20110112161052.000|TR0|State of the Union Address, something like 
20110112161052.000|20110112161055.000|TR0|this.

20110112161100.000|20110112161102.000|TR0|similar address at Fort Hood there in late 
20110112161102.000|20110112161105.000|TR0|2009, after that terrible tragedy, so many 
20110112161105.000|20110112161107.000|TR0|folks who were killed there, as well.  And 
20110112161107.000|20110112161110.000|TR0|so he's had a little bit of a experience 
20110112161110.000|20110112161112.000|TR0|with this, but every time something like 
20110112161112.000|20110112161115.000|TR0|this comes up, it's obviously unique.
20110112161115.000|20110112161117.000|TR0|
20110112161117.000|20110112161120.000|TR0|We saw Ronald Reagan after the Challenger 
20110112161120.000|20110112161122.000|TR0|disaster, Bill Clinton after Oklahoma 
20110112161122.000|20110112161125.000|TR0|City, when, again, there were far more 
20110112161125.000|20110112161127.000|TR0|people killed than we saw this time.  That 
20110112161127.000|20110112161130.000|TR0|was a very difficult task.  President Bush 
20110112161130.000|20110112161133.000|TR0|after 9/11.

20110112162243.000|20110112162246.000|TR0|BASH:  Oh, I mean, not at all, not even in

20110112162248.000|20110112162251.000|TR0|certainly seen and heard about threats to

20110112164518.000|20110112164520.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  There were so many -- there 
20110112164520.000|20110112164523.000|TR0|were donations just pouring into Haiti, so 
20110112164523.000|20110112164525.000|TR0|what happened to all the money?
20110112164525.000|20110112164528.000|TR0|
20110112164528.000|20110112164530.000|TR0|WATSON:  That's a complicated question.  
20110112164530.000|20110112164533.000|TR0|Some of the fault probably lies with the 
20110112164533.000|20110112164535.000|TR0|Haitian government, which itself was 
20110112164535.000|20110112164538.000|TR0|nearly decapitated in this earthquake with 
20110112164538.000|20110112164541.000|TR0|government ministry buildings destroyed 
20110112164541.000|20110112164543.000|TR0|and a lot of civil servants workers 
20110112164543.000|20110112164546.000|TR0|killed.  And it was a weak government in 
20110112164546.000|20110112164548.000|TR0|the first place, but there's been 
20110112164548.000|20110112164551.000|TR0|criticism that there was not enough
